snippet: In one of the deadliest Taliban attacks in recent months, 10 Afghan civilians, two Afghan police officers and four Czech soldiers were killed when a suicide bomber riding a bicycle attacked a village north of Kabul.
abstract: Suicide bomber kills 16 people in northern Afghanistan, one of the deadliest Taliban attacks in recent months.
lead_paragraph: In one of the deadliest Taliban attacks in recent months, 10 Afghan civilians, two Afghan police officers and four Czech soldiers were killed when a suicide bomber riding a bicycle attacked a village north of Kabul.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Taliban Strike in Deadly Bombing
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Taliban Strike in Deadly Bombing
